name: エアロブラスト
description:
くうきの　うずを
はっしゃして
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: わたほうし
description:
わたのような
フワフワの　ほうしを
まとわり　つかせて
あいての　すばやさを
がくっと　さげる。

name: きしかいせい
description:
ちからを　ふりしぼり
こうげきする。
じぶんの　ＨＰが
すくないほど　わざの
いりょくは　あがる。

name: うらみ
description:
あいてが　さいごに
つかった　わざに
うらみを　いだいて
そのわざの　ＰＰを
４だけ　へらす。

name: こなゆき
description:
つめたい　こなゆきを
あいてに　ふきつけて
こうげきする。
こおり　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: まもる
description:
あいての　こうげきを
まったく　うけない。
れんぞくで　だすと
しっぱい　しやすい。

name: マッハパンチ
description:
めにも　とまらない
ものすごい　はやさで
パンチを　くりだす。
かならず　せんせい
こうげき　できる。

name: こわいかお
description:
おそろしい　かおで
にらみ　おびえさせて
あいての　すばやさを
がくっと　さげる。

name: だましうち
description:
あいてに　ちかづき
ゆだんした　すきを
みて　なぐりつける。
こうげきは　かならず
めいちゅう　する。

name: てんしのキッス
description:
てんしのように
かわいく　キスして
あいてを　こんらんの
じょうたいに　する。

name: はらだいこ
description:
じぶんの　ＨＰを
さいだい　ＨＰの
はんぶん　へらして
じぶんの　こうげきを
さいだいに　あげる。

name: ヘドロばくだん
description:
きたない　ヘドロを
あいてに　なげつけて
こうげきする。
どく　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: どろかけ
description:
あいての　かおなどに
ドロを　なげつけて
こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを
さげる。

name: オクタンほう
description:
あいての　かおなどに
すみを　ふきかけて
こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを
さげることが　ある。

name: まきびし
description:
あいての　あしもとに
まきびしを　しかける。
こうたいで　でてきた
あいての　ポケモンに
ダメージを　あたえる。

name: でんじほう
description:
たいほうの　ような
でんきを　はっしゃして
こうげきする。
あいてを　まひの
じょうたいに　する。

name: みやぶる
description:
ゴーストタイプに
こうかがない　わざや
かいひりつの　たかい
あいてに　こうげきが
あたるように　なる。

name: みちづれ
description:
わざを　だしたあと
こうげきを　うけて
ひんしに　なったとき
こうげき　あいても
ひんしに　する。

name: ほろびのうた
description:
きいた　ポケモンは
３ターン　たつと
ひんしに　なる。
こうたいすると
こうかは　なくなる。

name: こごえるかぜ
description:
つめたい　れいきを
あいてに　ふきつけて
こうげきする。
どうじに　あいての
すばやさを　さげる。

name: みきり
description:
あいての　こうげきを
まったく　うけない。
れんぞくで　だすと
しっぱい　しやすい。

name: ボーンラッシュ
description:
かたい　ホネで
あいてを　なぐりつけて
こうげきする。
２ー５かいの　あいだ
れんぞくで　だす。

name: ロックオン
description:
しょうじゅんを
しっかり　あわせて
つぎの　こうげきが
かならず　あいてに
あたるように　する。

name: げきりん
description:
２ー３ターンの　あいだ
あばれまくって
こうげきする。
あばれた　あとは
こんらん　する。

name: すなあらし
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
すなあらしで　いわ
じめん　はがねタイプ
いがいの　ポケモンに
ダメージを　あたえる。

name: ギガドレイン
description:
ようぶんを　すいとり
こうげきする。
あたえた　ダメージの
はんぶんの　ＨＰを
かいふく　できる。

name: こらえる
description:
こうげきを　うけても
ＨＰを　かならず
１だけ　のこせる。
れんぞくで　だすと
しっぱい　しやすい。

name: あまえる
description:
かわいく　みつめて
ゆだんを　さそい
あいての　こうげきを
がくっと　さげる。

name: ころがる
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
ころがりつづけて
こうげきする。
わざが　あたる　たびに
いりょくが　あがる。

name: みねうち
description:
あいての　ＨＰが
かならず　１だけ
のこる　ように
てかげん　して
こうげきする。

name: いばる
description:
あいてを　おこらせて
こんらん　させる。
いかりで　あいての
こうげきは　ぐーんと
あがってしまう。

name: ミルクのみ
description:
さいだい　ＨＰの
はんぶん　じぶんの
ＨＰを　かいふくする。
なかまに　ＨＰを
わけることも　できる。

name: スパーク
description:
でんきを　まとい
とっしんして
こうげきする。
まひ　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: れんぞくぎり
description:
カマや　ツメ　などで
あいてを　きりつけて
こうげきする。
れんぞくで　あてると
いりょくが　あがる。

name: はがねのつばさ
description:
かたい　つばさを
あいてに　たたきつけて
こうげきする。
じぶんの　ぼうぎょが
あがることが　ある。

name: くろいまなざし
description:
すいこまれる　ような
くろい　まなざしで
じっと　みつめて
あいてを　せんとうから
にげられなく　する。

name: メロメロ
description:
♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を
ゆうわくして
メロメロに　する。
あいては　わざが
だしにくく　なる。

name: ねごと
description:
じぶんが　おぼえている
わざの　うち　どれか
１つを　くりだす。
じぶんが　ねている
ときだけ　つかえる。

name: いやしのすず
description:
ここちよい　すずの
ねいろを　きかせて
みかた　ぜんいんの
じょうたい　いじょうを
かいふくする。

name: おんがえし
description:
トレーナーの　ために
ぜんりょくで　あいてを
こうげきする。
なついて　いるほど
いりょくは　あがる。

name: プレゼント
description:
わなを　しかけた
はこを　わたして
こうげきする。
ＨＰが　かいふくして
しまうことも　ある。

name: やつあたり
description:
ふまんを　はらすため
ぜんりょくで　あいてを
こうげきする。
なついて　いないほど
いりょくは　あがる。

name: しんぴのまもり
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
ふしぎな　ちからに
まもられて
じょうたい　いじょうに
ならなくなる。

name: いたみわけ
description:
じぶんの　ＨＰと
あいての　ＨＰを
あわせて　それを
じぶんと　あいてで
なかよく　わける。

name: せいなるほのお
description:
しんぴの　ほのおで
あいてを　やきつくして
こうげきする。
やけど　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: マグニチュード
description:
じめんを　ゆらして
まわりに　いるものを
すべて　こうげきする。
わざの　いりょくは
いろいろ　かわる。

name: ばくれつパンチ
description:
こんしんの　ちからで
パンチを　くりだして
こうげきする。
あいてを　かならず
こんらん　させる。

name: メガホーン
description:
かたくて　りっぱな
つので　おもいっきり
あいてを　つきさして
こうげきする。

name: りゅうのいぶき
description:
ものすごい　いきを
あいてに　ふきつけて
こうげきする。
まひ　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: バトンタッチ
description:
ひかえの　ポケモンと
いれかわる。
のうりょく　へんかは
かわった　ポケモンが
そのまま　うけつぐ。

name: アンコール
description:
あいてが　さいごに
つかった　わざを
３ー７ターンの　あいだ
ずっと　ださせる。

name: おいうち
description:
あいて　ポケモンが
いれかわる　ときに
わざを　だしていると
２ばいの　いりょくで
こうげき　できる。

name: こうそくスピン
description:
かいてん　こうげき。
しめつける　まきつく
やどりぎのタネ
まきびし　なども
ふきとばせる。

name: あまいかおり
description:
かおりで　あいての
かいひりつを　さげる。
くさむら　などで
つかうと　ポケモンが
よってくる。

name: アイアンテール
description:
かたい　しっぽで
あいてを　たたきつけて
こうげきする。
あいての　ぼうぎょを
さげることが　ある。

name: メタルクロー
description:
こうてつの　ツメで
あいてを　きりさいて
こうげきする。
じぶんの　こうげきが
あがることが　ある。

name: あてみなげ
description:
あいてより　あとに
こうげきする。
そのかわり　じぶんの
こうげきは　かならず
めいちゅうする。

name: あさのひざし
description:
じぶんの　ＨＰを
かいふくする。
てんきに　よって
かいふくの　りょうが\x0001
へんかする。

name: こうごうせい
description:
じぶんの　ＨＰを
かいふくする。
てんきに　よって
かいふくの　りょうが\x0001
へんかする。

name: つきのひかり
description:
じぶんの　ＨＰを
かいふくする。
てんきに　よって
かいふくの　りょうが\x0001
へんかする。

name: めざめるパワー
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: クロスチョップ
description:
りょうて　チョップを
あいてに　たたきつけて
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: たつまき
description:
たつまきを　おこして
あいてを　まきこみ
こうげきする。
あいてを　ひるませる
ことが　ある。

name: あまごい
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
あめを　ふらせて
みずタイプの
わざの　いりょくを
あげる。

name: にほんばれ
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
ひざしを　つよくして
ほのおタイプの
わざの　いりょくを
あげる。

name: かみくだく
description:
するどい　はで
あいてを　かみくだいて
こうげきする。
あいての　ぼうぎょを
さげることが　ある。

name: ミラーコート
description:
あいてから　うけた
とくしゅ　こうげきの
ダメージを
２ばいに　して
そのあいてに　かえす。

name: じこあんじ
description:
じぶんに　あんじを
かけることで
のうりょく　へんかの
じょうたいを　あいてと\x0001
おなじにする。

name: しんそく
description:
めにも　とまらない
はやさで　あいてに
とっしんする。
かならず　せんせい
こうげき　できる。

name: げんしのちから
description:
げんしの　ちからで
こうげきする。
じぶんの　すべての
のうりょくが\x0001
あがることが　ある。

name: シャドーボール
description:
くろいかげの
かたまりを　なげつけて
こうげきする。
あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

name: みらいよち
description:
わざを　つかった
２ターン　あとに
あいてに　ねんりきの
かたまりを　おくって
こうげきする。

name: いわくだき
description:
いわを　くだくような
パンチで　あいてを
こうげきする。
ひびわれた　いわも
こわせる。

name: うずしお
description:
２ー５ターンの　あいだ
あいてを　とじこめて
こうげきする。
うずしおの　なかを
とおることも　できる。

name: ふくろだたき
description:
みかた　ぜんいんで
こうげきする。
なかまの　ポケモンが
おおいほど　わざの
いりょくは　あがる。

name: ねこだまし
description:
せんせい　こうげきで
あいてを　ひるませる。
せんとうに　でたら
すぐに　ださないと
せいこう　しない。

name: さわぐ
description:
２ー５ターンの　あいだ
さわいで　こうげき。
そのあいだは　だれも
ねむれなく　なる。

name: たくわえる
description:
ちからを　たくわえて
じぶんの　ぼうぎょと
とくぼうを　あげる。
さいだい　３かいまで
たくわえられる。

name: はきだす
description:
たくわえた　ちからを
あいてに　ぶつけて
こうげきする。
たくわえて　いるほど
いりょくが　あがる。

name: のみこむ
description:
たくわえた　ちからを
のみこんで　じぶんの
ＨＰを　かいふくする。
たくわえて　いるほど
かいふくする。

name: ねっぷう
description:
あつい　いきを
あいてに　ふきつけて
こうげきする。
やけど　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: あられ
description:
５ターンの　あいだ
あられを　ふらして
こおりタイプで　ない
ポケモン　ぜんいんに\x0001
ダメージを　あたえる。

name: いちゃもん
description:
いちゃもんを　つけて
おなじ　わざを
２かい　れんぞくで
だせなくする。

name: おだてる
description:
あいてを　おだてて
こんらん　させる。
どうじに　あいての
とくこうも　あげて
しまう。

name: おにび
description:
ぶきみで　あやしい
ほのおを　はなって
あいてを　やけどの
じょうたいに　する。

name: おきみやげ
description:
じぶんは　ひんしに
なるが　そのかわりに
あいての　こうげきと
とくこうを　がくっと
さげる。

name: からげんき
description:
じぶんが　どく　まひ
やけど　じょうたいの
とき　くりだすと
わざの　いりょくが
２ばいに　なる。

name: きあいパンチ
description:
せいしんを　たかめて
パンチを　くりだす。
わざを　だす　までに
こうげきを　うけると
しっぱいする。

name: きつけ
description:
まひ　じょうたいの
あいてには　いりょく
２ばいに　なるが
そのかわり　あいての
まひが　なおる。

name: このゆびとまれ
description:
じぶんに　ちゅうもく
させて　あいてからの
こうげきを　すべて
じぶんに　むけさせる。

name: しぜんのちから
description:
しぜんの　ちからで
こうげきする。
つかう　ばしょで
でてくる　わざが
へんかする。

name: じゅうでん
description:
つぎの　ターンに　だす
でんきタイプの　わざの
いりょくを　あげる。
じぶんの　とくぼうも
あがる。

name: ちょうはつ
description:
あいてを　おこらせる。
２ー４ターンの　あいだ
あいては　ダメージを
あたえる　わざしか
だせなくなる。

name: てだすけ
description:
なかまを　たすける。
てだすけ　された
ポケモンの　わざの
いりょくは　いつもより
おおきくなる。

name: トリック
description:
あいての　すきを
ついて　じぶんと
あいての　もちものを
こうかんする。

name: なりきり
description:
あいてに　なりきって
じぶんも　あいてと
おなじ　とくせいに
へんかする。

name: ねがいごと
description:
つぎの　ターンに
じぶんの　ＨＰを
さいだい　ＨＰの
はんぶんだけ
かいふくする。

name: ねこのて
description:
おおいそぎで　みかたの
たすけを　かりて
ひかえの　ポケモンが
おぼえている　わざを
どれか　１つ　つかう。

name: ねをはる
description:
だいちに　ねを　はり
まいターン　ＨＰを
かいふくする。
ねを　はっているので
いれかえられない。

name: ばかぢから
description:
すごい　ちからを
はっきして　あいてを
こうげきする。
じぶんの　こうげきと
ぼうぎょが　さがる。

name: マジックコート
description:
じょうたい　いじょうや
のうりょくを　さげる
わざ　やどりぎのタネ
などを　だされたとき
あいてに　はねかえす。

name: リサイクル
description:
せんとうちゅうに
つかって　なくなった
じぶんの　もちものを
さいせい　させて
つかえるように　する。

name: リベンジ
description:
あいてから　わざを
うけていると　その
あいてに　たいして
あたえる　ダメージが
２ばいに　なる。

name: かわらわり
description:
かたい　こぶしなどで
こうげきする。
ひかりのかべや
リフレクターも
はかいできる。

name: あくび
description:
おおきな　あくびで
ねむけを　さそう。
つぎの　ターンに
あいてを　ねむりの
じょうたいに　する。

name: はたきおとす
description:
あいての　もちものを
はたき　おとして
せんとうが　おわるまで
つかえなく　する。

name: がむしゃら
description:
あいての　ＨＰが
じぶんの　ＨＰと
おなじ　くらいに
なるように　ダメージを
あたえる。

name: ふんか
description:
いかりを　ばくはつ
させて　こうげきする。
じぶんの　ＨＰが
すくないほど　わざの
いりょくは　さがる。

name: スキルスワップ
description:
ちょうのうりょくで
じぶんの　とくせいと
あいての　とくせいを
いれかえる。

name: ふういん
description:
あいてが　じぶんと
おなじ　わざを
おぼえていたら
あいてだけ　そのわざを
つかえなく　する。

name: リフレッシュ
description:
からだを　やすめて
じぶんが　おっている
どく　まひ　やけどの
じょうたい　いじょうを
なおす。

name: おんねん
description:
あいての　わざで
ひんしに　されたとき
おんねんを　かけて
そのわざの　ＰＰを
０に　する。

name: よこどり
description:
あいてが　つかおうと
した　かいふくわざや
のうりょく　へんかの
わざを　うばって
じぶんに　つかう。

name: ひみつのちから
description:
ひみつの　ちからで
こうげきする。
つかう　ばしょで
ついかこうかが
へんかする。

name: ダイビング
description:
１ターンめで　ふかく
もぐり　２ターンめ
うきあがって　あいてを
こうげきする。

name: つっぱり
description:
ひらいた　りょうてで
あいてを　つっぱって
こうげきする。
２ー５かいの　あいだ
れんぞくで　だす。

name: ほごしょく
description:
みずべや　くさむら
どうくつなど　いる
ばしょに　あわせて
じぶんの　タイプを
かえる。

name: ほたるび
description:
てんめつする　ひかりを
ながめて　せいしんを
とういつし　じぶんの
とくこうを　ぐーんと
あげる。

name: ラスターパージ
description:
まばゆい　ひかりを
かいほうして
こうげきする。
あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

name: ミストボール
description:
きりじょうの
うもうで　つつみこみ
こうげきする。
あいての　とくこうを
さげることが　ある。

name: フェザーダンス
description:
うもうを　ふりまいて
こうげきする。
からだに　からませて
あいての　こうげきを
がくっと　さげる。

name: フラフラダンス
description:
フラフラと　ダンスを
おどって　まわりに
いるものを　すべて
こんらん　じょうたいに
させる。

name: ブレイズキック
description:
こうげきした　あいてを
やけど　じょうたいに
することが　ある。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつも　たかい。

name: どろあそび

name: ニードルアーム

name: ハイパーボイス

name: どくどくのキバ

name: ブレイククロー

name: ブラストバーン

name: ハイドロカノン

name: コメットパンチ

name: おどろかす

name: ウェザーボール

name: アロマセラピー

name: うそなき

name: オーバーヒート

name: かぎわける

name: がんせきふうじ

name: くすぐる

name: シャドーパンチ

name: じんつうりき

name: スカイアッパー

name: すなじごく

name: ぜったいれいど

name: だくりゅう

name: タネマシンガン

name: つばめがえし

name: つららばり

name: てっぺき

name: とおぼえ

name: ドラゴンクロー

name: ハードプラント

name: ポイズンテール

name: ほしがる

name: ボルテッカー

name: マジカルリーフ

name: リーフブレード

name: りゅうのまい

name: ロックブラスト
description:
かたい　がんせきを

name: でんげきは

name: みずのはどう

name: はめつのねがい

name: ミラクルアイ

name: しぼりとる

name: パワースワップ

ちょうのうりょくで

name: ガードスワップ

ぼうぎょと　とくぼうの

name: おしおき

name: ハートスワップ

name: フレアドライブ

name: はっけい

name: はどうだん

name: ロックカット

name: つじぎり

name: アクアテール

name: タネばくだん

name: エアスラッシュ
description:

name: シザークロス
description:

name: むしのさざめき

name: りゅうのはどう

name: ドラゴンダイブ

name: パワージェム
description:
ほうせきの　ように

name: ドレインパンチ

name: しんくうは

name: きあいだま

name: エナジーボール

name: ブレイブバード

じぶんも　かなり

name: だいちのちから

name: すりかえ

name: ギガインパクト

name: バレットパンチ

だんがんの　ような
はやくて　かたい

name: ゆきなだれ

あいてから　わざを

name: こおりのつぶて

こおりの　かたまりを
いっしゅんで　つくり

こうげき　できる。

name: シャドークロー
description:
かげから　つくった
するどい　ツメで
あいてを　きりさく。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: かみなりのキバ
description:
でんきを　ためた
キバで　かみつく。
あいてを　ひるませたり
まひ　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: こおりのキバ
description:
れいきを　ひめた
キバで　かみつく。
あいてを　ひるませたり
こおり　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: ほのおのキバ
description:
ほのおを　まとった
キバで　かみつく。
あいてを　ひるませたり
やけど　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: かげうち
description:
かげを　のばして
あいての　はいごから
こうげきする。
かならず　せんせい
こうげき　できる。

name: どろばくだん
description:
かたい　どろのたまを
あいてに　はっしゃして
こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを
さげることが　ある。

name: サイコカッター
description:
じったいか　させた
こころの　やいばで
あいてを　きりさく。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: しねんのずつき
description:
しねんの　ちからを
ひたいに　あつめて
ずつきする。
あいてを　ひるませる
ことがある。

name: ミラーショット
description:
みがき　あげられた
からだから　せんこうの
ちからを　はなつ。
めいちゅうりつを
さげることが　ある。

name: ラスターカノン
description:
からだの　ひかりを
いってんに　あつめて
ちからを　はなつ。
あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

name: ロッククライム
description:
とっしん　こうげきで
あいてを　こんらん
させることが　ある。
ごつごつした　かべを
のぼることも　できる。

name: きりばらい
description:
あいての　かいひりつを
さげる。　あいてがわに
ある　まきびしや
ひかりのかべ　などの
こうかも　けす。

name: トリックルーム
description:
まかふしぎな\x0001
くうかんを　つくる。
５ターンの　あいだ
おそい　ポケモンから
こうどう　できる。

name: りゅうせいぐん
description:
てんくうから
いんせきを　おとす。
つかうと　はんどうで
じぶんの　とくこうが
がくっと　さがる。

name: ほうでん
description:
まばゆい　でんげきで
まわりに　いるものを
すべて　こうげきする。
まひ　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: ふんえん
description:
まっかな　ほのおで
まわりに　いるものを
すべて　こうげきする。
やけど　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: リーフストーム
description:
とがった　はっぱで
あらしを　おこす。
つかうと　はんどうで
じぶんの　とくこうが
がくっと　さがる。

name: パワーウィップ
description:
つたや　しょくしゅを
はげしく　ふるって
あいてを　たたきつけ
こうげきする。

name: がんせきほう
description:
きょだいな　いわを
あいてに　はっしゃして
こうげきする。
つぎの　ターンは
うごけなく　なる。

name: クロスポイズン
description:
あいてを　きりさく。
どく　じょうたいに
することが　あり
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつも　たかい。

name: ダストシュート
description:
きたない　ゴミを
あいてに　ぶつけて
こうげきする。
どく　じょうたいに
することが　ある。

name: アイアンヘッド
description:
はがねの　ような
かたい　あたまで
こうげきする。
あいてを　ひるませる
ことが　ある。

name: マグネットボム
description:
あいてに　すいつく
はがねの　ばくだんを
はっしゃする。
こうげきは　かならず
めいちゅう　する。

name: ストーンエッジ
description:
とがった　いわを
あいてに　つきさして
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: ゆうわく
description:
♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を
ゆうわくして
あいての　とくこうを
がくっと　さげる。

name: ステルスロック
description:
あいての　まわりに
むすうの　いわを
うかべて　こうたいで
でてきた　ポケモンに
ダメージを　あたえる。

name: くさむすび
description:
くさを　からませて
あいてを　ころばせる。
あいてが　おもいほど
いりょくが　あがる。

name: おしゃべり
description:
おぼえた　ことばで
おんぱを　おこして
こうげきする。
あいてを　こんらん
させることが　ある。

name: さばきのつぶて
description:
むすうの　こうだんを
ほうしゅつする。
じぶんの　もつ
プレートに　より
タイプが　かわる。

name: むしくい
description:
かみついて　こうげき。
あいてが　きのみを
もっている　とき
たべて　きのみの
こうかを　うけられる。

name: チャージビーム
description:
でんげきの　たばを
あいてに　はっしゃする。
でんきを　ためこんで
じぶんの　とくこうを
あげることが　ある。

name: ウッドハンマー
description:
かたい　どうたいを
あいてに　たたきつけて
こうげきする。
じぶんも　かなり
ダメージを　うける。

name: アクアジェット
description:
めにも　とまらない
ものすごい　はやさで
あいてに　つっこむ。
かならず　せんせい
こうげき　できる。

name: こうげきしれい
description:
しもべを　よびだして
あいてに　むかって
こうげき　させる。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: ぼうぎょしれい
description:
しもべを　よびだして
じぶんの　からだに
おおい　つかせる。
ぼうぎょと　とくぼうを
あげることが　できる。

name: かいふくしれい
description:
しもべを　よびだして
きずを　なおす。
さいだい　ＨＰの
はんぶんだけ　ＨＰを
かいふくする。

name: もろはのずつき
description:
いのちを　かけて
こんしんの　ちからで
こうげきする。
じぶんも　ものすごい
ダメージを　うける。

name: ダブルアタック
description:
しっぽなどを　つかい
あいてを　たたいて
こうげきする。
２かい　れんぞくで
ダメージを　あたえる。

name: ときのほうこう
description:
じかんが　ゆがむほどの
きょだいな　ちからを
うちだして　こうげき。
つぎの　ターンは
うごけなく　なる。

name: あくうせつだん
description:
まわりの　くうかんごと
あいてを　ひきさき
ダメージを　あたえる。
きゅうしょに　あたる
かくりつが　たかい。

name: みかづきのまい
description:
じぶんは　ひんしに
なるが　ひかえから
でてくる　ポケモンの
すべての　じょうたいを
ぜんかいふく　する。

name: にぎりつぶす
description:
すさまじい　ちからで
にぎり　つぶす。
あいての　ＨＰが
のこっている　ほど
いりょくが　あがる。

name: マグマストーム
description:
はげしく　もえたぎる
ほのおの　なかに
２ー５ターンの　あいだ
あいてを　とじこめて
こうげきする。

name: ダークホール
description:
あんこくの　せかいに
ひきずり　おとして
あいてを　ねむりの
じょうたいに　する。

name: シードフレア
description:
からだの　なかから
しょうげきはを
はっせい　させる。
あいての　とくぼうを
さげることが　ある。

name: あやしいかぜ
description:
みのけも　よだつ
とっぷうを　おこす。
じぶんの　すべての
のうりょくが
あがることが　ある。

name: シャドーダイブ
description:
１ターンめで　きえて
２ターンめに　あいてを
こうげきする。
まもっていても\x0001
こうげきは　あたる。

name: めざめるパワー (かくとう)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (ひこう)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (どく)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (じめん)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (いわ)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (むし)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (ゴースト)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (はがね)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (ほのお)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (みず)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (くさ)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (でんき)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (エスパー)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (こおり)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (ドラゴン)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: めざめるパワー (あく)
description:
わざを　つかった
ポケモンに　よって
あいてに　あたえる
わざの　タイプと
いりょくが　かわる。

name: Pound
description:
The foe is physically
pounded with a long
tail or a foreleg,
etc.

name: Karate Chop
description:
The foe is attacked
with a sharp chop.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: DoubleSlap
description:
The foe is slapped
repeatedly, back
and forth, two to
five times in a row.

name: Comet Punch
description:
The foe is hit with
a flurry of punches
that strike two to
five times in a row.

name: Mega Punch
description:
The foe is slugged
by a punch thrown
with muscle-packed
power.

name: Pay Day
description:
Numerous coins are
hurled at the foe to
inflict damage.
Money is earned
after battle.

name: Fire Punch
description:
The foe is punched
with a fiery fist.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

name: Ice Punch
description:
The foe is punched
with an icy fist.
It may leave the
target frozen.

name: ThunderPunch
description:
The foe is punched
with an electrified
fist. It may leave
the target with
paralysis.

name: Scratch
description:
Hard, pointed, and
sharp claws rake the
foe to inflict damage.

name: ViceGrip
description:
Huge, impressive
pincers grip and
squeeze the foe.

name: Guillotine
description:
A vicious, tearing
attack with pincers.
The foe will faint
instantly if this
attack hits.

name: Razor Wind
description:
A two-turn attack.
Blades of wind hit the
foe on the second
turn. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Swords Dance
description:
A frenetic dance to
uplift the fighting
spirit. It sharply
raises the user’s
Attack stat.

name: Cut
description:
The foe is cut with a
scythe or a claw.
It can also be used
to cut down thin
trees.

name: Gust
description:
A gust of wind is
whipped up by wings
and launched at the
foe to inflict damage.

name: Wing Attack
description:
The foe is struck
with large, imposing
wings spread wide
to inflict damage.

name: Whirlwind
description:
The foe is blown away,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon
in its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

name: Fly
description:
The user soars, then
strikes on the second
turn. It can also be
used for flying to
any familiar town.

name: Bind
description:
A long body or
tentacles are used
to bind and squeeze
the foe for two to
five turns.

name: Slam
description:
The foe is slammed
with a long tail,
vines, etc., to inflict
damage.

name: Vine Whip
description:
The foe is struck
with slender, whiplike
vines to inflict
damage.

name: Stomp
description:
The foe is stomped
with a big foot.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Double Kick
description:
The foe is quickly
kicked twice in
succession using both
feet.

name: Mega Kick
description:
The foe is attacked
by a kick launched
with muscle-packed
power.

name: Jump Kick
description:
The user jumps up
high, then strikes
with a kick. If the
kick misses, the
user hurts itself.

name: Rolling Kick
description:
The user lashes 
out with a quick,
spinning kick. It
may also make the
target flinch.

name: Sand-Attack
description:
Sand is hurled in the
foe’s face, reducing
its accuracy.

name: Headbutt
description:
The user attacks with
its head. It may make
the foe flinch. To find
Pokémon, hit trees.

name: Horn Attack
description:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed horn to
inflict damage.

name: Fury Attack
description:
The foe is jabbed
repeatedly with a
horn or beak two to
five times in a row.

name: Horn Drill
description:
The foe is stabbed
with a horn rotating
like a drill.
The foe instantly
faints if it hits.

name: Tackle
description:
A physical attack
in which the user
charges and slams
into the foe with
its whole body.

name: Body Slam
description:
The user drops onto
the foe with its full
body weight.
It may leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: Wrap
description:
A long body or vines
are used to wrap and
squeeze the foe for
two to five turns.

name: Take Down
description:
A reckless, full-body
charge attack for
slamming into the foe.
It also damages the
user a little.

name: Thrash
description:
The user rampages
and attacks for two
to three turns.
It then becomes
confused, however.

name: Double-Edge
description:
A reckless, life-
risking tackle.
It also damages the
user by a fairly large
amount, however.

name: Tail Whip
description:
The user wags its tail
cutely, making the
foe less wary.
The target’s Defense
stat is lowered.

name: Poison Sting
description:
The foe is stabbed
with a poisonous
barb of some sort.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Twineedle
description:
The foe is stabbed
twice by a pair of
stingers.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Pin Missile
description:
Sharp pins are shot
at the foe in rapid
succession.
They hit two to five
times in a row.

name: Leer
description:
The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.

name: Bite
description:
The foe is bitten with
viciously sharp fangs.
It may make the
target flinch.

name: Growl
description:
The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.

name: Roar
description:
The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

name: Sing
description:
A soothing lullaby is
sung in a calming
voice that puts the
foe into a deep
slumber.

name: Supersonic
description:
The user generates
odd sound waves from
its body.
It may confuse the
target.

name: SonicBoom
description:
The foe is hit with a
destructive shock
wave that always
inflicts 20 HP damage.

name: Disable
description:
For several turns,
this move prevents
the foe from using
the move it last
used.

name: Acid
description:
The foe is attacked
with a spray of harsh
acid. It may also
lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: Ember
description:
The foe is attacked
with small flames.
The target may also
be left with a burn.

name: Flamethrower
description:
The foe is scorched
with an intense blast
of fire. The target
may also be left with
a burn.

name: Mist
description:
The user cloaks its
body with a white mist
that prevents any of
its stats from being
cut for five turns.

name: Water Gun
description:
The foe is blasted
with a forceful shot
of water.

name: Hydro Pump
description:
The foe is blasted by
a huge volume of
water launched under
great pressure.

name: Surf
description:
It swamps the entire
battlefield with a
giant wave.
It can also be used
for crossing water.

name: Ice Beam
description:
The foe is struck
with an icy-cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze
the target solid.

name: Blizzard
description:
A howling blizzard is
summoned to strike
the foe.
It may also freeze
the target solid.

name: Psybeam
description:
The foe is attacked
with a peculiar ray.
It may also leave the
target confused.

name: BubbleBeam
description:
A spray of bubbles is
forcefully ejected
at the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed stat.

name: Aurora Beam
description:
The foe is hit with a
rainbow-colored beam.
It may also lower the
target’s Attack
stat.

name: Hyper Beam
description:
The foe is attacked
with a powerful beam.
The user must rest
on the next turn to
regain its energy.

name: Peck
description:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed beak or
horn.

name: Drill Peck
description:
A corkscrewing
attack with the
sharp beak acting
as a drill.

name: Submission
description:
The user grabs the
foe and recklessly
dives for the ground.
It also hurts the
user slightly.

name: Low Kick
description:
A powerful low kick
that makes the foe
fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on
heavier foes.

name: Counter
description:
A retaliation move
that counters any
physical attack,
inflicting double the
damage taken.

name: Seismic Toss
description:
The foe is thrown
using the power of
gravity. It inflicts
damage equal to
the user’s level.

name: Strength
description:
The foe is slugged
with a punch thrown
at maximum power.
It can also be used
to move boulders.

name: Absorb
description:
A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

name: Mega Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

name: Leech Seed
description:
A seed is planted on
the foe. It steals
some HP from the foe
to heal the user on
every turn.

name: Growth
description:
The user’s body is
forced to grow all at
once. It raises the
Sp. Atk stat.

name: Razor Leaf
description:
Sharp-edged leaves
are launched to slash
at the foe. It has a
high critical-hit
ratio.

name: SolarBeam
description:
A two-turn attack.
The user gathers
light, then blasts a
bundled beam on the
second turn.

name: PoisonPowder
description:
A cloud of poisonous
dust is scattered on
the foe.
It may poison the
target.

name: Stun Spore
description:
The user scatters a
cloud of paralyzing
powder.
It may paralyze the
target.

name: Sleep Powder
description:
The user scatters a
big cloud of sleep-
inducing dust around
the foe.

name: Petal Dance
description:
The user attacks by
scattering petals for
two to three turns.
The user then
becomes confused.

name: String Shot
description:
The foe is bound with
silk blown from the
user’s mouth.
It reduces the
target’s Speed stat.

name: Dragon Rage
description:
The foe is stricken
by a shock wave.
This attack always
inflicts 40 HP
damage.

name: Fire Spin
description:
The foe becomes
trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire
that rages for two
to five turns.

name: ThunderShock
description:
A jolt of electricity
is hurled at the foe
to inflict damage.
It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

name: Thunderbolt
description:
A strong electric
blast is loosed at
the foe.
It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

name: Thunder Wave
description:
A weak electric
charge is launched at
the foe.
It causes paralysis if
it hits.

name: Thunder
description:
A wicked thunderbolt
is dropped on the foe
to inflict damage.
It may also leave the
target paralyzed.

name: Rock Throw
description:
The user picks up
and throws a small
rock at the foe to
attack.

name: Earthquake
description:
The user sets off an
earthquake that hits
all the Pokémon in
the battle.

name: Fissure
description:
The user opens up a
fissure in the ground
and drops the foe in.
The target instantly
faints if it hits.

name: Dig
description:
The user burrows,
then attacks on the
second turn.
It can also be used
to exit dungeons.

name: Toxic
description:
A move that leaves
the target badly
poisoned.
Its poison damage
worsens every turn.

name: Confusion
description:
The foe is hit by a
weak telekinetic
force. It may also
leave the foe
confused.

name: Psychic
description:
The foe is hit by a
strong telekinetic
force. It may also
reduce the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: Hypnosis
description:
The user employs
hypnotic suggestion
to make the target
fall into a deep
sleep.

name: Meditate
description:
The user meditates
to awaken the power
deep within its body
and raise its Attack
stat.

name: Agility
description:
The user relaxes and
lightens its body to
move faster.
It sharply boosts
the Speed stat.

name: Quick Attack
description:
The user lunges at
the foe at a speed
that makes it almost
invisible. It is sure
to strike first.

name: Rage
description:
While this move is in
use, it gains attack
power each time the
user is hit in battle.

name: Teleport
description:
Use it to flee from
any wild Pokémon.
It can also warp to
the last Pokémon
Center visited.

name: Night Shade
description:
The user makes the
foe see a mirage.
It inflicts damage
matching the user’s
level.

name: Mimic
description:
The user copies the
move last used by
the foe. The move can
be used for the rest
of the battle.

name: Screech
description:
An earsplitting
screech is emitted to
sharply reduce the
foe’s Defense stat.

name: Double Team
description:
By moving rapidly, the
user makes illusory
copies of itself to
raise its evasiveness.

name: Recover
description:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its max HP.

name: Harden
description:
The user stiffens all
the muscles in its
body to raise its
Defense stat.

name: Minimize
description:
The user compresses
its body to make
itself look smaller.
The user’s evasion
stat is boosted.

name: SmokeScreen
description:
The user releases an
obscuring cloud of
smoke or ink.
It reduces the foe’s
accuracy.

name: Confuse Ray
description:
The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

name: Withdraw
description:
The user withdraws
its body into its hard
shell, raising its
Defense stat.

name: Defense Curl
description:
The user curls up to
conceal weak spots
and raise its Defense
stat.

name: Barrier
description:
The user throws up a
sturdy wall that
sharply raises its
Defense stat.

name: Light Screen
description:
A wondrous wall of
light is put up to
suppress damage from
special attacks for
five turns.

name: Haze
description:
The user creates a
haze that eliminates
every stat change
among all the Pokémon
engaged in battle.

name: Reflect
description:
A wondrous wall of
light is put up to
suppress damage from
physical attacks for
five turns.

name: Focus Energy
description:
The user takes a
deep breath and
focuses to raise the
critical-hit ratio of
its attacks.

name: Bide
description:
The user endures
attacks for two
turns, then strikes
back to cause double
the damage taken.

name: Metronome
description:
The user waggles a
finger and stimulates
the brain into
randomly using nearly
any move.

name: Mirror Move
description:
The user counters
the foe by mimicking
the move last used
by the foe.

name: Selfdestruct
description:
The user blows up to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

name: Egg Bomb
description:
A large egg is hurled
with maximum force at
the foe to inflict
damage.

name: Lick
description:
The foe is licked with
a long tongue, causing
damage.
It may also paralyze
the target.

name: Smog
description:
The foe is attacked
with a discharge of
filthy gases.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Sludge
description:
Unsanitary sludge is
hurled at the foe.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Bone Club
description:
The user clubs the
foe with a bone.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Fire Blast
description:
The foe is attacked
with an intense blast
of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: Waterfall
description:
The user charges at
the foe rapidly, and
may make it flinch.
It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

name: Clamp
description:
The foe is clamped
and squeezed by
the user’s very thick
and sturdy shell for
two to five turns.

name: Swift
description:
Star-shaped rays are
shot at the foe.
This attack never
misses.

name: Skull Bash
description:
The user tucks in its
head to raise its
Defense in the first
turn, then rams the
foe on the next turn.

name: Spike Cannon
description:
Sharp spikes are
fired at the foe to
strike two to five
times in rapid
succession.

name: Constrict
description:
The foe is attacked
with long, creeping
tentacles or vines.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed.

name: Amnesia
description:
The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Kinesis
description:
The user distracts
the foe by bending a
spoon.
It may lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: Softboiled
description:
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP.
It may also be used
to heal an ally’s HP.

name: Hi Jump Kick
description:
The foe is attacked
with a knee kick from
a jump. If it misses,
the user is hurt
instead.

name: Glare
description:
The user intimidates
the foe with the
pattern on its belly
to cause paralysis.

name: Dream Eater
description:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.

name: Poison Gas
description:
A cloud of poison gas
is sprayed in the
foe’s face.
It may poison the
target.

name: Barrage
description:
Round objects are
hurled at the foe to
strike two to five
times in a row.

name: Leech Life
description:
A blood-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

name: Lovely Kiss
description:
With a scary face, the
user tries to force a
kiss on the foe. If it
succeeds, the target
falls asleep.

name: Sky Attack
description:
A second-turn attack
move with a high
critical-hit ratio.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Transform
description:
The user transforms
into a copy of the
foe right down to
having the same move
set.

name: Bubble
description:
A spray of countless
bubbles is jetted at
the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed stat.

name: Dizzy Punch
description:
The foe is hit with
rhythmically launched
punches that may also
leave it confused.

name: Spore
description:
The user scatters
bursts of spores
that induce sleep.

name: Flash
description:
The user flashes a
light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy.
It can also be used
to illuminate caves.

name: Psywave
description:
The foe is attacked
with an odd, hot
energy wave.
The attack varies in
intensity.

name: Splash
description:
The user just flops
and splashes around
to no effect at all...

name: Acid Armor
description:
The user alters its
cellular structure to
liquefy itself,
sharply raising its
Defense stat.

name: Crabhammer
description:
The foe is hammered
with a large pincer.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Explosion
description:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

name: Fury Swipes
description:
The foe is raked with
sharp claws or
scythes for two to
five times in quick
succession.

name: Bonemerang
description:
The user throws the
bone it holds. The
bone loops to hit the
foe twice, coming and
going.

name: Rest
description:
The user goes to
sleep for two turns.
It fully restores the
user’s HP and heals
any status problem.

name: Rock Slide
description:
Large boulders are
hurled at the foe to
inflict damage.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Hyper Fang
description:
The user bites hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Sharpen
description:
The user reduces its
polygon count to
make itself more
jagged, raising the
Attack stat.

name: Conversion
description:
The user changes its
type to become the
same type as one of
its moves.

name: Tri Attack
description:
The user strikes with
a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.

name: Super Fang
description:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.

name: Slash
description:
The foe is attacked
with a slash of
claws, etc.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Substitute
description:
The user makes a
copy of itself using
some of its HP.
The copy serves as
the user’s decoy.

name: Struggle
description:
An attack that is
used in desperation
only if the user has
no PP. It also hurts
the user slightly.

name: Sketch
description:
It enables the user
to permanently learn
the move last used by
the foe. Once used,
Sketch disappears.

name: Triple Kick
description:
A consecutive three-
kick attack that
becomes more
powerful with each 
successive hit.

name: Thief
description:
The user attacks and
steals the foe’s held
item simultaneously.
It can’t steal if the
user holds an item.

name: Spider Web
description:
The user ensnares
the foe with a thin,
gooey silk so it can’t
flee from battle.

name: Mind Reader
description:
The user senses the
foe’s movements
with its mind to
ensure its next
attack does not miss.

name: Nightmare
description:
A sleeping foe is
shown a nightmare
that inflicts some
damage every turn.

name: Flame Wheel
description:
The user cloaks
itself in fire and
charges at the foe.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: Snore
description:
An attack that can
be used only if the
user is asleep. The
harsh noise may also
make the foe flinch.

name: Curse
description:
A move that works
differently for the
Ghost type than for
all the other types.

name: Flail
description:
The user flails about
aimlessly to attack.
It becomes more
powerful the less HP
the user has.

name: Conversion 2
description:
The user changes its
type to make itself
resistant to the type
of the attack it
last took.

name: Aeroblast
description:
A vortex of air is
shot at the foe to
inflict damage.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Cotton Spore
description:
The user releases
cottonlike spores
that cling to the
foe, sharply reducing
its Speed stat.

name: Reversal
description:
An all-out attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.

name: Spite
description:
The user looses its
grudge on the move
last used by the foe
by cutting 4 PP from
it.

name: Powder Snow
description:
The user attacks with
a chilling gust of
powdery snow.
It may also freeze
the target.

name: Protect
description:
It enables the user
to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in
succession.

name: Mach Punch
description:
The user throws a
punch at blinding
speed.
It is certain to
strike first.

name: Scary Face
description:
The user frightens
the foe with a scary
face to sharply
reduce its Speed
stat.

name: Faint Attack
description:
The user draws up to
the foe disarmingly,
then throws a sucker
punch.
It hits without fail.

name: Sweet Kiss
description:
The user kisses the
foe with a sweet,
angelic cuteness that
causes confusion.

name: Belly Drum
description:
The user maximizes
its Attack stat in
exchange for HP
equal to half its max
HP.

name: Sludge Bomb
description:
The user attacks by
hurling filthy sludge
at the foe.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Mud-Slap
description:
The user hurls mud in
the foe’s face to
inflict damage and
lower its accuracy.

name: Octazooka
description:
The user attacks by
spraying ink in the
foe’s face or eyes.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap
of spikes at the
foe’s feet. The trap
hurts foes that
switch into battle.

name: Zap Cannon
description:
The user fires an
electric blast like a
cannon to inflict
damage and cause
paralysis.

name: Foresight
description:
Enables the user to
hit a Ghost type with
any type of move. It
also enables the user
to hit an evasive foe.

name: Destiny Bond
description:
When this move is
used, if the user
faints, the foe that
landed the knockout
hit also faints.

name: Perish Song
description:
Any Pokémon that
hears this song
faints in three turns,
unless it switches
out of battle.

name: Icy Wind
description:
The user attacks with
a gust of chilled air.
It also lowers the
target’s Speed stat.

name: Detect
description:
It enables the user
to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in
succession.

name: Bone Rush
description:
The user strikes at
the foe with a hard
bone two to five
times in a row.

name: Lock-On
description:
The user takes sure
aim at the foe.
It ensures the next
attack does not fail
to hit the target.

name: Outrage
description:
The user rampages
and attacks for two
to three turns.
However, it then
becomes confused.

name: Sandstorm
description:
A five-turn sand-
storm is summoned
to hurt all combatant
types except Rock, 
Ground, and Steel.

name: Giga Drain
description:
A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

name: Endure
description:
The user endures any
attack with at least
1 HP. Its chance of
failing rises if it is
used in succession.

name: Charm
description:
The user charmingly
stares at the foe,
making it less wary.
The target’s Attack
is sharply lowered.

name: Rollout
description:
The user continually
rolls into the foe
over five turns. It
becomes stronger
each time it hits.

name: False Swipe
description:
A restrained attack
that prevents the
foe from fainting.
The target is left
with at least 1 HP.

name: Swagger
description:
The user enrages the
foe into confusion.
However, it also
sharply raises the
foe’s Attack stat.

name: Milk Drink
description:
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP.
It may also be used
to heal an ally’s HP.

name: Spark
description:
The user throws an
electrically charged
tackle at the foe.
It may also leave the
target paralyzed.

name: Fury Cutter
description:
The foe is slashed
with scythes or
claws. Its power
increases if it hits
in succession.

name: Steel Wing
description:
The foe is hit with
wings of steel.
It may also raise the
user’s Defense stat.

name: Mean Look
description:
The user affixes the
foe with a dark,
arresting look.
The target becomes
unable to flee.

name: Attract
description:
If it is the opposite
gender of the user,
the foe becomes
infatuated and less
likely to attack.

name: Sleep Talk
description:
While it is asleep, the
user randomly uses
one of the moves it
knows.

name: Heal Bell
description:
The user makes a
soothing bell chime
to heal the status
problems of all the
party Pokémon.

name: Return
description:
A full-power attack
that grows more
powerful the more
the user likes its
Trainer.

name: Present
description:
The user attacks by
giving the foe a
booby-trapped gift.
It restores HP
sometimes, however.

name: Frustration
description:
A full-power attack
that grows more
powerful the less
the user likes its
Trainer.

name: Safeguard
description:
The user creates a
protective field that
prevents status
problems for five
turns.

name: Pain Split
description:
The user adds its HP
to the foe’s HP, then
equally shares the
combined HP with the
foe.

name: Sacred Fire
description:
The foe is razed with
a mystical fire of
great intensity.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: Magnitude
description:
The user looses a
ground-shaking quake
affecting everyone in
battle. Its power
varies.

name: DynamicPunch
description:
The foe is punched
with the user’s full,
concentrated power.
It confuses the foe
if it hits.

name: Megahorn
description:
Using its tough
and impressive
horn, the user
rams into the foe 
with no letup.

name: DragonBreath
description:
The user exhales
a mighty gust that
inflicts damage.
It may also paralyze
the target.

name: Baton Pass
description:
The user switches
places with a party
Pokémon in waiting,
passing along any
stat changes.

name: Encore
description:
The user compels the
foe to keep using
only the move it last
used for three to
seven turns.

name: Pursuit
description:
An attack move that
inflicts double damage
if used on a foe that
is switching out of
battle.

name: Rapid Spin
description:
A spin attack that
can also eliminate
such moves as Bind,
Wrap, Leech Seed,
and Spikes.

name: Sweet Scent
description:
A sweet scent that
lowers the foe’s
evasiveness. It also
lures wild Pokémon
if used in grass, etc.

name: Iron Tail
description:
The foe is slammed
with a steel-hard
tail. It may also
lower the target’s
Defense stat.

name: Metal Claw
description:
The foe is raked
with steel claws.
It may also raise the
user’s Attack stat.

name: Vital Throw
description:
The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.

name: Morning Sun
description:
The user restores its
own HP.
The amount of HP
regained varies with
the weather.

name: Synthesis
description:
The user restores its
own HP.
The amount of HP
regained varies with
the weather.

name: Moonlight
description:
The user restores its
own HP.
The amount of HP
regained varies with
the weather.

name: Hidden Power
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Cross Chop
description:
The user delivers a
double chop with its
forearms crossed.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Twister
description:
The user whips up a
vicious tornado to
tear at the foe.
It may also make the
foe flinch.

name: Rain Dance
description:
The user summons a
heavy rain that falls
for five turns,
powering up Water-
type moves.

name: Sunny Day
description:
The user intensifies
the sun for five
turns, powering up
Fire-type moves.

name: Crunch
description:
The user crunches up
the foe with sharp
fangs. It may also
lower the target’s
Defense stat.

name: Mirror Coat
description:
A retaliation move
that counters any
special attack,
inflicting double the
damage taken.

name: Psych Up
description:
The user hypnotizes
itself into copying
any stat change
made by the foe.

name: ExtremeSpeed
description:
The user charges the
foe at blinding speed.
This attack always
goes before any
other move.

name: AncientPower
description:
The user attacks with
a prehistoric power.
It may also raise all
the user’s stats at
once.

name: Shadow Ball
description:
The user hurls a
shadowy blob at the
foe. It may also
lower the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: Future Sight
description:
Two turns after this
move is used, the foe
is attacked with a
hunk of psychic
energy.

name: Rock Smash
description:
The user hits with a
punch that may lower
the target’s Defense.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.

name: Whirlpool
description:
Traps the foe inside a
whirlpool that lasts
for two to five turns.
The user can pass
through whirlpools.

name: Beat Up
description:
The user gets all the
party Pokémon to
attack the foe. The
more party Pokémon,
the more damage.

name: Fake Out
description:
An attack that hits
first and makes the
target flinch. It only
works the first turn
the user is in battle.

name: Uproar
description:
The user attacks in
an uproar for two to
five turns. Over that
time, no one can fall
asleep.

name: Stockpile
description:
The user charges
up power, and raises
both its Defense and
Sp. Def. The move can
be used three times.

name: Spit Up
description:
The power stored
using the move
Stockpile is released
at once in an attack.

name: Swallow
description:
The power stored
using the move
Stockpile is absorbed
by the user to heal
its HP.

name: Heat Wave
description:
The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.

name: Hail
description:
The user summons a
hailstorm lasting five
turns. It damages all
Pokémon except the
Ice type.

name: Torment
description:
The user torments
and enrages the foe,
making it incapable of
using the same move
twice in a row.

name: Flatter
description:
Flattery is used to
confuse the foe.
However, it also
raises the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description:
The user shoots a
sinister, bluish white
flame at the foe to
inflict a burn.

name: Memento
description:
The user faints upon
using this move.
In return, it sharply
lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk.

name: Facade
description:
An attack move that
doubles its power if
the user is poisoned,
paralyzed, or has a
burn.

name: Focus Punch
description:
The user focuses its
mind before launching
a punch. It will fail
if the user is hit
before it is used.

name: SmellingSalt
description:
This attack inflicts
double damage on a
paralyzed foe. It
also cures the foe’s
paralysis, however.

name: Follow Me
description:
The user draws
attention to itself,
making all foes take
aim only at the user.

name: Nature Power
description:
An attack that makes
use of nature’s
power. Its effects
vary depending on the
user’s environment.

name: Charge
description:
The user boosts the
power of the Electric
move it uses next.
It also raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Taunt
description:
The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use only
attack moves for two
to four turns.

name: Helping Hand
description:
A move that boosts
the power of the
ally’s attack in a
Double Battle.

name: Trick
description:
The user catches the
foe off guard and
swaps the foe’s held
item with its own.

name: Role Play
description:
The user mimics the
foe completely,
copying the foe’s
natural ability.

name: Wish
description:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP
in the next turn.

name: Assist
description:
The user hurriedly
and randomly uses a
move among those
known by other
Pokémon in the party.

name: Ingrain
description:
The user lays roots
that restore HP on
every turn.
Because it is rooted,
it can’t switch out.

name: Superpower
description:
The user attacks the
foe with great power.
However, it also
lowers the user’s
Attack and Defense.

name: Magic Coat
description:
A barrier reflects
back to the foe
moves like Leech
Seed and moves
that damage status.

name: Recycle
description:
The user recycles a
held item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.

name: Revenge
description:
An attack move that
inflicts double the
damage if the user
has been hurt by the
foe in the same turn.

name: Brick Break
description:
The user attacks with
tough fists, etc. It
can also break any
barrier such as Light
Screen and Reflect.

name: Yawn
description:
The user lets loose a
huge yawn that lulls
the foe into falling
asleep on the next
turn.

name: Knock Off
description:
The user slaps down
the foe’s held item,
preventing the item
from being used
during the battle.

name: Endeavor
description:
An attack move that
cuts down the foe’s
HP to equal the
user’s HP.

name: Eruption
description:
The user attacks in
an explosive fury.
The lower the user’s
HP, the less powerful
this attack becomes.

name: Skill Swap
description:
The user employs its
psychic power to
exchange abilities
with the foe.

name: Imprison
description:
If the foe knows any
move also known by
the user, the foe
is prevented
from using it.

name: Refresh
description:
The user rests
to cure itself of a
poisoning, burn, or
paralysis.

name: Grudge
description:
If the user faints,
the user’s grudge
fully depletes the PP
of the foe’s move
that knocked it out.

name: Snatch
description:
The user steals the
effects of any
healing or stat-
changing move the foe
attempts to use.

name: Secret Power
description:
The user attacks with
a secret power. Its
added effects vary
depending on the
user’s environment.

name: Dive
description:
A two-turn attack.
The user dives
underwater on the
first turn, then hits
on the next turn.

name: Arm Thrust
description:
The user looses a
flurry of open-palmed
arm thrusts that hit
two to five times in a
row.

name: Camouflage
description:
The user’s type is
changed depending on
its environment, such
as at water’s edge, in
grass, or in a cave.

name: Tail Glow
description:
The user stares at
flashing lights to
focus its mind,
sharply raising its
Sp. Atk stat.

name: Luster Purge
description:
The user looses a
damaging burst of
light. It may also
reduce the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: Mist Ball
description:
A mistlike flurry of
down envelops and
damages the foe. It
may also lower the
target’s Sp. Atk.

name: FeatherDance
description:
The user covers the
foe with a mass of
down that sharply
lowers the Attack
stat.

name: Teeter Dance
description:
The user performs a
wobbly dance that
confuses all the
Pokémon in battle.

name: Blaze Kick
description:
The user launches a
kick with a high
critical-hit ratio.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

name: Mud Sport
description:
The user covers
itself with mud. It
weakens Electric-
type moves while the
user is in the battle.

name: Ice Ball
description:
The user continually
rolls into the foe
over five turns. It
becomes stronger
each time it hits.

name: Needle Arm
description:
The user attacks by
wildly swinging its
thorny arms.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Slack Off
description:
The user slacks off,
restoring its own HP
by up to half of its
maximum HP.

name: Hyper Voice
description:
The user lets loose
a horribly echoing
shout with the
power to inflict
damage.

name: Poison Fang
description:
The user bites the
foe with toxic fangs.
It may also leave the
foe badly poisoned.

name: Crush Claw
description:
The user slashes the
foe with hard and
sharp claws.
It may also lower the
target’s Defense.

name: Blast Burn
description:
The foe is razed by
a fiery explosion.
The user must rest
on the next turn,
however.

name: Hydro Cannon
description:
The foe is hit with
a watery blast.
The user must rest
on the next turn,
however.

name: Meteor Mash
description:
The foe is hit with a
hard punch fired
like a meteor.
It may also raise
the user’s Attack.

name: Astonish
description:
The user attacks the
foe while shouting in
a startling fashion.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Weather Ball
description:
An attack move that
varies in power and
type depending on
the weather.

name: Aromatherapy
description:
The user releases a
soothing scent that
heals all status
problems affecting
the user’s party.

name: Fake Tears
description:
The user feigns
crying to make the
foe feel flustered,
sharply lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name: Air Cutter
description:
The user launches
razorlike wind to
slash the foe.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Overheat
description:
The user attacks the
foe at full power.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Odor Sleuth
description:
Enables the user to
hit a Ghost type with
any type of move. It
also enables the user
to hit an evasive foe.

name: Rock Tomb
description:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
Speed by preventing
its movement.

name: Silver Wind
description:
The foe is attacked
with powdery scales
blown by wind.
It may also raise all
the user’s stats.

name: Metal Sound
description:
A horrible sound like
scraping metal is
emitted to sharply
reduce the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: GrassWhistle
description:
The user plays a
pleasant melody that
lulls the foe into a
deep sleep.

name: Tickle
description:
The user tickles the
foe into laughing,
reducing its Attack
and Defense stats.

name: Cosmic Power
description:
The user absorbs a
mystical power from
space to raise its
Defense and Sp. Def
stats.

name: Water Spout
description:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.

name: Signal Beam
description:
The user attacks with
a sinister beam of
light. It may also
confuse the target.

name: Shadow Punch
description:
The user throws a
punch at the foe from
the shadows.
The punch lands
without fail.

name: Extrasensory
description:
The user attacks with
an odd, unseeable
power.
It may also make the
foe flinch.

name: Sky Uppercut
description:
The user attacks the
foe with an uppercut
thrown skyward
with force.

name: Sand Tomb
description:
The user traps the
foe inside a harshly
raging sandstorm for
two to five turns.

name: Sheer Cold
description:
The foe is attacked
with a blast of
absolute-zero cold.
The foe instantly
faints if it hits.

name: Muddy Water
description:
The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the
foe’s accuracy.

name: Bullet Seed
description:
The user forcefully
shoots seeds at the
foe. Two to five
seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

name: Aerial Ace
description:
The user confounds
the foe with speed,
then slashes.
The attack lands
without fail.

name: Icicle Spear
description:
The user launches
sharp icicles at the
foe. It strikes two
to five times in a
row.

name: Iron Defense
description:
The user hardens
its body’s surface
like iron, sharply
raising its Defense
stat.

name: Block
description:
The user blocks the
foe’s way with arms
spread wide to
prevent escape.

name: Howl
description:
The user howls loudly
to raise its spirit,
boosting its Attack
stat.

name: Dragon Claw
description:
The user slashes the
foe with huge, sharp
claws.

name: Frenzy Plant
description:
The foe is slammed
with an enormous
tree.
The user can’t move
on the next turn.

name: Bulk Up
description:
The user tenses its
muscles to bulk up
its body, boosting
both its Attack and
Defense stats.

name: Bounce
description:
The user bounces up
high, then drops on
the foe on the second
turn. It may also
paralyze the foe.

name: Mud Shot
description:
The user attacks by
hurling a blob of mud
at the foe.
It also reduces the
target’s Speed.

name: Poison Tail
description:
An attack with a
high critical-hit
ratio. This tail 
attack may also 
poison the foe.

name: Covet
description:
The user endearingly
approaches the foe,
then steals the item
the foe is holding.

name: Volt Tackle
description:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.

name: Magical Leaf
description:
The user scatters
curious leaves that
chase the foe.
This attack will not
miss.

name: Water Sport
description:
The user soaks itself
with water. The move
weakens Fire-type
moves while the user
is in the battle.

name: Calm Mind
description:
The user quietly
focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to
raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.

name: Leaf Blade
description:
The foe is slashed
with a sharp leaf.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Dragon Dance
description:
The user vigorously
performs a mystic,
powerful dance that
boosts its Attack and
Speed stats.

name: Rock Blast
description:
The user hurls hard
rocks at the foe.
Two to five rocks are
launched in quick
succession.

name: Shock Wave
description:
The user strikes the
foe with a quick jolt
of electricity.
This attack cannot be
evaded.

name: Water Pulse
description:
The user attacks the
foe with a pulsing
blast of water.
It may also confuse
the foe.

name: Doom Desire
description:
Two turns after this
move is used, the
user blasts the foe
with a concentrated
bundle of light.

name: Psycho Boost
description:
The user attacks the
foe at full power.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Roost
description:
The user lands and
rests its body.
It restores the
user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.

name: Gravity
description:
Gravity is intensified
for five turns, making
moves involving flying
unusable and
negating Levitation.

name: Miracle Eye
description:
Enables the user to
hit a Dark type with
any type of move. It
also enables the user
to hit an evasive foe.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description:
This attack inflicts
high damage on a
sleeping foe. It
also wakes the foe
up, however.

name: Hammer Arm
description:
The user swings and
hits with its strong
and heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s
Speed, however.

name: Gyro Ball
description:
The user tackles the
foe with a high-speed
spin. The slower the
user, the greater
the damage.

name: Healing Wish
description:
The user faints. In
return, the Pokémon
taking its place will
have its HP restored
and status cured.

name: Brine
description:
If the foe’s HP is
down to about half,
this attack will hit
with double the
power.

name: Natural Gift
description:
The user draws power
to attack by using
its held Berry.
The Berry determines
its type and power.

name: Feint
description:
An attack that hits a
foe using Protect or
Detect. It also lifts
the effects of those
moves.

name: Pluck
description:
The user pecks the
foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the
user plucks it and
gains its effect.

name: Tailwind
description:
The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.

name: Acupressure
description:
The user applies
pressure to stress
points, sharply
boosting one of its
stats.

name: Metal Burst
description:
The user retaliates
against the foe that
last inflicted damage
on it with much
greater power.

name: U-turn
description:
After making its
attack, the user
rushes back to switch
places with a party
Pokémon in waiting.

name: Close Combat
description:
The user fights the
foe up close without
guarding itself. It
also cuts the user’s
Defense and Sp. Def.

name: Payback
description:
If the user can use
this attack after the
foe attacks, its
power is doubled.

name: Assurance
description:
If the foe has
already taken some
damage in the same
turn, this attack’s
power is doubled.

name: Embargo
description:
It prevents the foe
from using its held
item. Its Trainer is
also prevented from
using items on it.

name: Fling
description:
The user flings its
held item at the foe
to attack. Its power
and effects depend
on the item.

name: Psycho Shift
description:
Using its psychic
power of suggestion,
the user transfers
its status problems
to the target.

name: Trump Card
description:
The fewer PP this
move has, the more
power it has for
attack.

name: Heal Block
description:
The user prevents
the foe from using
any HP-recovery
moves for five turns.

name: Wring Out
description:
The user powerfully
wrings the foe.
The more HP the foe
has, the greater this
attack’s power.

name: Power Trick
description:
The user employs its
psychic power to
switch its Attack
with its Defense
stat.

name: Gastro Acid
description:
The user hurls up its
stomach acids on
the foe. The fluid
eliminates the effect
of the foe’s ability.

name: Lucky Chant
description:
The user chants an
incantation toward
the sky, preventing
the foe from landing
critical hits.

name: Me First
description:
The user tries to cut
ahead of the foe to
steal and use the
foe’s intended move
with greater power.

name: Copycat
description:
The user mimics the
move used immediately
before it. The move
fails if no other move
has been used yet.

name: Power Swap
description:
The user employs its
psychic power to
switch changes to
its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the foe.

name: Guard Swap
description:
The user employs its
psychic power to
switch changes to
its Defense and
Sp. Def with the foe.

name: Punishment
description:
This attack’s power
increases the more
the foe has powered
up with stat changes.

name: Last Resort
description:
This move can be used
only after the user
has used all the
other moves it knows
in the battle.

name: Worry Seed
description:
A seed that causes
worry is planted on
the foe. It prevents
sleep by making its
ability Insomnia.

name: Sucker Punch
description:
This move enables the
user to attack first.
It fails if the foe is
not readying an
attack, however.

name: Toxic Spikes
description:
The user lays a trap
of poison spikes at
the foe’s feet. They
poison foes that
switch into battle.

name: Heart Swap
description:
The user employs its
psychic power to
switch stat changes
with the foe.

name: Aqua Ring
description:
The user envelops
itself in a veil made
of water. It regains
some HP on every
turn.

name: Magnet Rise
description:
The user levitates
using electrically
generated magnetism
for five turns.

name: Flare Blitz
description:
The user cloaks
itself in fire and
charges at the foe.
The user sustains
serious damage, too.

name: Force Palm
description:
The foe is attacked
with a shock wave.
It may also leave the
target paralyzed.

name: Aura Sphere
description:
The user looses a
blast of aura power
from deep within its
body. This move is
certain to hit.

name: Rock Polish
description:
The user polishes its
body to reduce drag.
It can sharply raise
the Speed stat.

name: Poison Jab
description:
The foe is stabbed
with a tentacle or
arm steeped in
poison. It may also
poison the foe.

name: Dark Pulse
description:
The user releases a
horrible aura imbued
with dark thoughts.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Night Slash
description:
The user slashes the
foe the instant an
opportunity arises.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Aqua Tail
description:
The user attacks by
swinging its tail as if
it were a vicious wave
in a raging storm.

name: Seed Bomb
description:
The user slams a
barrage of hard-
shelled seeds
down on the foe
from above.

name: Air Slash
description:
The user attacks with
a blade of air that
slices even the sky.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: X-Scissor
description:
The user slashes at
the foe by crossing
its scythes or claws
as if they were a pair
of scissors.

name: Bug Buzz
description:
The user vibrates its
wings to generate a
damaging sound wave.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Dragon Pulse
description:
The foe is attacked
with a shock wave
generated by the
user’s gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
description:
The user tackles the
foe while exhibiting
overwhelming menace.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Power Gem
description:
The user attacks with
a ray of light that
sparkles as if it were
made of gemstones.

name: Drain Punch
description:
An energy-draining
punch. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

name: Vacuum Wave
description:
The user whirls its
fists to send a wave
of pure vacuum at
the foe. This move
always goes first.

name: Focus Blast
description:
The user heightens
its mental focus and
unleashes its power.
It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def.

name: Energy Ball
description:
The user draws power
from nature and
fires it at the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def.

name: Brave Bird
description:
The user tucks in
its wings and charges
from a low altitude.
The user also takes
serious damage.

name: Earth Power
description:
The user makes the
ground under the foe
erupt with power.
It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def.

name: Switcheroo
description:
The user trades held
items with the foe
faster than the eye
can follow.

name: Giga Impact
description:
The user charges at
the foe using every
bit of its power.
The user must rest
on the next turn.

name: Nasty Plot
description:
The user stimulates
its brain by thinking
bad thoughts.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Atk.

name: Bullet Punch
description:
The user strikes
with a tough punch as
fast as a bullet.
This move always goes
first.

name: Avalanche
description:
An attack move that
inflicts double the
damage if the user
has been hurt by the
foe in the same turn.

name: Ice Shard
description:
The user flash
freezes chunks of
ice and hurls them.
This move always goes
first.

name: Shadow Claw
description:
The user slashes with
a sharp claw made
from shadows.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Thunder Fang
description:
The user bites with
electrified fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or become
paralyzed.

name: Ice Fang
description:
The user bites with
cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.

name: Fire Fang
description:
The user bites with
flame-cloaked fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or sustain
a burn.

name: Shadow Sneak
description:
The user extends its
shadow and attacks
the foe from behind.
This move always goes
first.

name: Mud Bomb
description:
The user launches a
hard-packed mud ball
to attack.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: Psycho Cut
description:
The user tears at
the foe with blades
formed by psychic
power. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Zen Headbutt
description:
The user focuses its
willpower to its head
and rams the foe.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Mirror Shot
description:
The user looses a
flash of energy from
its polished body.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

name: Flash Cannon
description:
The user gathers all
its light energy and
releases it at once.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Rock Climb
description:
A charging attack
that may also leave
the foe confused.
It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.

name: Defog
description:
It reduces the foe’s
evasion stat. It also
removes spikes,
light screens, etc.

name: Trick Room
description:
The user creates a
bizarre area in which
slower Pokémon get
to move first for five
turns.

name: Draco Meteor
description:
Comets are summoned
down from the sky.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Discharge
description:
A flare of electricity
is loosed to strike
all Pokémon in battle.
It may also cause
paralysis.

name: Lava Plume
description:
An inferno of scarlet
flames washes over
all Pokémon in battle.
It may also inflict
burns.

name: Leaf Storm
description:
A storm of sharp
leaves is whipped up.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Power Whip
description:
The user violently
whirls its vines or
tentacles to harshly
lash the foe.

name: Rock Wrecker
description:
The user launches a
huge boulder at the
foe to attack.
It must rest on the
next turn, however.

name: Cross Poison
description:
A slashing attack
that may also leave
the target poisoned.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Gunk Shot
description:
The user shoots
filthy garbage at the
foe to attack.
It may also poison
the target.

name: Iron Head
description:
The foe slams the
target with its
steel-hard head.
It may also make the
target flinch.

name: Magnet Bomb
description:
The user launches a
steel bomb that
sticks to the target.
This attack will not
miss.

name: Stone Edge
description:
The user stabs the
foe with a sharpened
stone. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Captivate
description:
If it is the opposite
gender of the user,
the foe is charmed
into sharply lowering
its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Stealth Rock
description:
The user lays a trap
of levitating stones
around the foe. The
trap hurts foes that
switch into battle.

name: Grass Knot
description:
The user snares the
foe with grass and
trips it. The heavier
the foe, the greater
the damage.

name: Chatter
description:
The user attacks
using a sound wave
based on words it has
learned. It may also
confuse the foe.

name: Judgment
description:
The user releases
countless shots of
light. Its type varies
with the kind of Plate
the user is holding.

name: Bug Bite
description:
The user bites the
foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the
user eats it and
gains its effect.

name: Charge Beam
description:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

name: Wood Hammer
description:
The user slams its
rugged body into the
foe to attack. The
user also sustains
serious damage.

name: Aqua Jet
description:
The user lunges at
the foe at a speed
that makes it almost
invisible. It is sure
to strike first.

name: Attack Order
description:
The user calls out
its underlings to
pummel the foe.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Defend Order
description:
The user calls out
its underlings to
shield its body,
raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Order
description:
The user calls out
its underlings to heal
it. The user regains
up to half of its
max HP.

name: Head Smash
description:
The user delivers a
life-endangering
attack at full power.
The user also takes
terrible damage.

name: Double Hit
description:
The user slams the
foe with a long tail,
vines, etc. The
target is hit
twice in a row.

name: Roar of Time
description:
The user blasts the
foe with power that
distorts even time.
The user must rest
on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
description:
The user tears the
foe along with the
space around it.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: Lunar Dance
description:
The user faints. In
return, the Pokémon
taking its place will
have its status and
HP fully restored.

name: Crush Grip
description:
The foe is crushed
with great force.
The attack is more
powerful the more HP
the foe has left.

name: Magma Storm
description:
The foe becomes
trapped within a
maelstrom of fire
that rages for two
to five turns.

name: Dark Void
description:
The foe is dragged
into a world of total
darkness that puts it
to sleep.

name: Seed Flare
description:
The user generates
a shock wave from
within its body.
It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def.

name: Ominous Wind
description:
The user creates a
gust of repulsive
wind. It may also
raise all the user’s
stats at once.

name: Shadow Force
description:
The user disappears,
then strikes the foe
on the second turn.
It hits even if the
foe protects itself.

name: Hidden Power (Fighting)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Flying)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Poison)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Ground)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Rock)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Bug)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Ghost)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Steel)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Fire)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Water)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Grass)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Electric)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Psychic)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Ice)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Dragon)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Hidden Power (Dark)
description:
A unique attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the Pokémon using
it.

name: Ecras’Face
description: Ecrase l’ennemi\navec les pattes\navant, la queue, etc.

name: Poing-Karaté
description: L’ennemi est tranché\nviolemment. Taux de\ncritiques élevé.

name: Torgnoles
description: Gifle rapidement\nl’ennemi de 2 à 5 fois\nd’affilée.

name: Poing Comète
description: Une tornade de coups\nde poing qui frappe de\n2 à 5 fois d’affilée.

name: Ultimapoing
description: L’ennemi reçoit un\ncoup de poing d’une\npuissance incroyable.

name: Jackpot
description:
Des pièces sont
lancées sur l’ennemi.
Permet d’obtenir de
l’argent à la fin du
combat.

name: Poing de Feu
description:
Un coup de poing
enflammé vient
frapper l’ennemi. Peut
le brûler.

name: Poinglace
description:
Un coup de poing glacé
vient frapper
l’ennemi. Peut le
geler.

name: Poing-Eclair
description:
Un coup de poing
électrique vient
frapper l’ennemi. Peut
le paralyser.

name: Griffe
description:
Lacère l’ennemi avec
des griffes acérées
pour lui infliger des
dégâts.

name: Force Poigne
description:
De gigantesques
barres se saisissent
de l’ennemi pour
l’écraser.

name: Guillotine
description:
De méchantes pinces
lacèrent l’ennemi, le
mettant K.O. sur le
coup s’il est touché.

name: Coupe-Vent
description:
Attaque en 2 tours.
Des lames de vent
frappent l’ennemi au
2\x01DF tour. Taux de
critiques élevé.

name: Danse-Lames
description:
Danse frénétique qui
exalte l’esprit
combatif. Augmente
considérablement
l’Attaque du lanceur.

name: Coupe
description:
Coupe l’ennemi avec
des lames ou des
griffes. Hors combat,
permet de couper des
arbres fins.

name: Tornade
description:
Le lanceur bat des
ailes pour générer
une bourrasque qui
blesse l’ennemi.

name: Cru-Aile
description:
L’ennemi est frappé
par de larges ailes
déployées pour
infliger des dégâts.

name: Cyclone
description:
Ejecte le Pokémon
ennemi et le remplace
par un autre. Dans la
nature, met fin au
combat.

name: Vol
description:
Le lanceur s’envole
au 1ᵉʳ tour et frappe
au 2\x01DF. Permet aussi
d’être porté dans une
ville connue.

name: Etreinte
description:
Ligote l’ennemi avec
les tentacules ou le
corps pour l’écraser
durant 2 à 5 tours.

name: Souplesse
description:
Fouette l’ennemi
avec la queue, une
liane, etc. pour
infliger des dégâts.

name: Fouet Lianes
description: Fouette l’ennemi avec\nde fines lianes pour\ninfliger des dégâts.

name: Ecrasement
description: Ecrase l’ennemi avec\nun énorme pied. Peut\naussi l’apeurer.

name: Double Pied
description: Deux coups de pied\nqui frappent l’ennemi\ndeux fois d’affilée.

name: Ultimawashi
description:
Un coup de pied
superpuissant et
intense qui frappe
l’ennemi.

name: Pied Sauté
description:
Le lanceur s’envole
pour décocher un
coup de pied sauté.
S’il échoue, le
lanceur se blesse.

name: Mawashi Geri
description:
Le lanceur effectue
un coup de pied
tournoyant et
extrêmement rapide.

name: Jet de Sable
description:
Lance du sable au
visage de l’ennemi
pour baisser sa
précision.

name: Coup d’Boule
description:
Le lanceur donne un
coup de tête. Peut
apeurer l’ennemi.
Peut faire tomber des
Pokémon des arbres.

name: Koud’Korne
description:
Frappe l’ennemi d’un
coup de corne pointue
pour infliger des
dégâts.

name: Furie
description: Frappe l’ennemi 2 à 5\nfois d’affilée avec un\nbec ou une corne.

name: Empal’Korne
description:
Un coup de corne en
vrille qui empale
l’ennemi, le mettant
K.O. sur le coup s’il
est touché.

name: Charge
description: Le lanceur charge\nl’ennemi et le percute\nde tout son corps.

name: Plaquage
description:
Le lanceur se laisse
tomber sur l’ennemi
de tout son poids.
Peut le paralyser.

name: Ligotage
description:
Le lanceur ligote
l’ennemi avec des
lianes ou son corps
pour l’écraser durant
2 à 5 tours.

name: Bélier
description:
Une charge violente
qui blesse aussi
légèrement le
lanceur.

name: Mania
description:
Une attaque furieuse
qui dure de 2 à 3
tours. Le lanceur
devient confus.

name: Damoclès
description:
Une dangereuse
charge. Inflige aussi
des dégâts assez
importants au
lanceur.

name: Mimi-Queue
description:
Le lanceur remue son
adorable queue pour
tromper la vigilance
de l’ennemi et baisser
sa Défense.

name: Dard-Venin
description:
Un dard toxique qui
transperce l’ennemi.
Peut aussi
l’empoisonner.

name: Double-Dard
description:
Un double coup de
dards qui transperce
l’ennemi. Peut aussi
l’empoisonner.

name: Dard-Nuée
description: Envoie une rafale de\ndards. Peut toucher\nde 2 à 5 fois.

name: Groz’Yeux
description:
Le lanceur fait les
gros yeux à l’ennemi
pour l’intimider et
baisser sa Défense.

name: Morsure
description:
L’ennemi est mordu
par de tranchantes
canines. Peut
l’apeurer.

name: Rugissement
description:
Le lanceur pousse un
cri tout mimi pour
tromper la vigilance
de l’ennemi et baisser
son Attaque.

name: Hurlement
description:
Effraie le Pokémon
ennemi et le remplace
par un autre. Dans la
nature, met fin au
combat.

name: Berceuse
description: Une berceuse plonge\nl’ennemi dans un\nprofond sommeil.

name: Ultrason
description:
Le lanceur produit
d’étranges ondes
sonores qui
rendent confus.

name: Sonicboom
description:
Une onde de choc
destructrice qui
inflige toujours 20 PV
de dégâts.

name: Entrave
description:
Empêche l’ennemi
d’employer à nouveau
sa dernière attaque.
Dure plusieurs tours.

name: Acide
description:
Le lanceur attaque
l’ennemi avec un jet
d’acide corrosif. Peut
aussi baisser la Déf.
Spé. de l’ennemi.

name: Flammèche
description:
L’ennemi est attaqué
par de faibles
flammes. Peut aussi le
brûler.

name: Lance-Flamme
description: L’ennemi reçoit un\ntorrent de flammes.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Brume
description:
Une brume blanche
enveloppe l’équipe du
lanceur et empêche la
réduction des stats
pour 5 tours.

name: Pistolet à O
description: De l’eau est projetée\nsur l’ennemi en arc de\ncercle.

name: Hydrocanon
description: Un puissant jet d’eau\nest dirigé sur\nl’ennemi.

name: Surf
description:
Une énorme vague
s’abat sur le champ
de bataille. Permet
aussi de voyager sur
l’eau.

name: Laser Glace
description: Un rayon de glace\nfrappe l’ennemi. Peut\naussi le geler.

name: Blizzard
description:
Une violente tempête
de neige est
déclenchée sur
l’ennemi. Peut aussi
le geler.

name: Rafale Psy
description:
Un étrange rayon
frappe l’ennemi. Peut
aussi le rendre
confus.

name: Bulles d’O
description:
Des bulles sont
envoyées avec
puissance sur
l’ennemi. Peut aussi
baisser sa Vitesse.

name: Onde Boréale
description:
Envoie un rayon
arc-en-ciel sur
l’ennemi. Peut aussi
baisser son Attaque.

name: Ultralaser
description:
Projette un puissant
rayon sur l’ennemi. Le
lanceur doit se
reposer au tour
suivant.

name: Picpic
description:
Frappe l’ennemi d’un
bec pointu ou d’une
corne pour infliger
des dégâts.

name: Bec Vrille
description: Une attaque utilisant\nle bec comme une\nperceuse.

name: Sacrifice
description:
Le lanceur agrippe
l’ennemi et l’écrase
au sol. Blesse aussi
légèrement le
lanceur.

name: Balayage
description:
Un puissant coup de
pied bas qui fauche
l’ennemi. Il est plus
efficace contre les
ennemis lourds.

name: Riposte
description:
Une riposte qui
contre toute attaque
physique en infligeant
le double de dégâts.

name: Frappe Atlas
description:
L’ennemi est projeté
grâce au pouvoir de
la gravité. Inflige des
dégâts équivalents au
niveau du lanceur.

name: Force
description:
Le lanceur cogne
l’ennemi de toute sa
force. Permet aussi
de déplacer des
rochers.

name: Vol-Vie
description:
Une attaque
qui convertit la
moitié des dégâts
infligés en PV.

name: Méga-Sangsue
description:
Une attaque
qui convertit la
